Literature.Title: Biological Profiling of Coleoptericins and Coleoptericin-Like Antimicrobial Peptides from the Invasive Harlequin Ladybird Harmonia axyridis.
Literature.Author: Hirsch R, Wiesner J, Marker A, Bauer A, Hammann PE, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µg/ml),Escherichia coli RKI 131/08(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Escherichia coli RKI 6A-6(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 30104(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae RKI 93/10(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae RKI 19/16(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa RKI 93/12(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=512µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii RKI 19/09(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium DSM 17050(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes DSM 20600(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis DSM 4479(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 607(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Candida albicans FH2173(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data)
